title: Performer
overview: The day before the wedding, Tomoki loses his job and fianc√©e due to the false charge of molesting. He decides to die and witnesses a woman screaming and fleeing the moment he tries to jump off the roof of the building. Her woman was attacked by a man with her knife, and even Tomoki who was there was stabbed ... I thought, they were all directing, Aika and her client.
